about.hero_title: We share knowledge with the world
about.hero_desc: TOTC is a global destination for online learning, connecting people through knowledge.
about.story_content_1: TOTC was founded with a simple yet ambitious vision: to bridge the gap between learners and experts worldwide. We believe that education should be accessible, affordable, and engaging for everyone, everywhere.
about.story_content_2: Starting as a small community of tech enthusiasts, we have grown into a platform hosting thousands of courses. We are not just an e-learning site; we are a community where potential meets opportunity.
about.value_1_desc: Learn from industry experts who are passionate about teaching.
about.value_2_desc: Study at your own pace, anytime, anywhere, on any device.
about.value_3_desc: Connect with learners from over 150 countries around the world.
